programme.title: Izmeklē Klāra
programme.desc: Zaudējusi darbu pulksteņu rūpnīcā, Klāra Degena pievienojas vietējai kriminālpolicijas nodaļai kā komisāra Pola Klainerta sekretāre, uz laiku aizstājot līdzšinējo darbinieci. Drīz vien viņa nespēj apvaldīt vilinājumu un iesaistās izmeklēšanā. Tā kā Klainerta kolēģiem Ollenhaueram un Volteram trūkst kriminālistiskās intuīcijas un ambīciju, Klāras "slepenās operācijas" galu galā padara viņu par neaizstājamu palīgu slepkavu un noziedznieku medībās.

programme.title: 900 sekundes
programme.desc: Informatīvi izklaidējošs darbdienu rīta raidījums, kurš iepazīstina ar Latvijas un pasaules svarīgākajiem jaunumiem un stāsta par aktuālajiem notikumiem politikā, ekonomikā, sportā un izklaides industrijā. Sarunas ar studijas viesiem par aktuālām tēmām, kā arī priecīgas un muzikālas tikšanās ar dažādiem cilvēkiem.

programme.title: Kandisa Renuāra 10
programme.desc: Kandisa varbūt neizskatās pēc tipiskas izmeklētājas. Viņa ir sievišķīga blondīne ar telefonu rozā maciņā, viņai patīk augsti papēži, kostīmiņi un spilgti krāsotas lūpas. Piedevām Kandisa ir vientuļā māte, audzina četrus bērnus, un pēdējos desmit gadus nav strādājusi. Nu viņa atgriežas darbā, pie kam vadošā amatā – par slepkavību izmeklēšanas nodaļas vadītāju. Pa šiem desmit gadiem policijas darbā daudz kas ir mainījies – tehnoloģijas ir attīstījušās, izmeklēšanas metodes ir citas. Priekšniecība ne īpaši tic Kandisas spējām, un viņas padotie galīgi nav sajūsmā par tādu vadītāju. Tomēr Kandisa jau pirmajā izmeklēšanā pierāda, ka viņai piemīt īpaša intuīcija un spējas, kas palīdz pamanīt to, kas citiem paslīd garām. Turklāt viņas dzīve nesastāv tikai no darba un bērniem – tieši kaimiņos dzīvo patīkams vīrietis, uz kuru Kandisa atstās neaizmirstamu iespaidu jau pēc pirmās tikšanās reizes.

programme.title: Viltus saderināšanās
programme.desc: Vēsturniecei Lunai uzticēts gādāt par mirušā tēva jūras muzeja krājumu, taču, lai to glābtu, Lunai jāizliekas, ka viņa ir saderinājusies ar bēdīgi slaveno tehnoloģiju magnāta dēlu Džeksonu. Atklājot, ka aiz Džeksona ārišķīgās fasādes slēpjas daudz vairāk, nekā sākumā šķita, Luna pamazām paplašina ne tikai profesionālo, bet arī romantisko attiecību apvārsni...

programme.title: Mani virtuves noslēpumi 7
programme.desc: Pavisam vienkārši, dažādu profesiju cilvēki, kuru kaislības ir ēdiens un gatavošana, metas aizraujošā piedzīvojumā – pierādīt, ka tieši viņi ir labākie pavāri Austrālijā. Šovā piedalās pāri, kurus dzīvē saista jebkas – viņi ir vīrs un sieva, draugi, kolēģi vai laimīgi šķīrušies –, bet pats galvenais – viņi ir lieliski sastrādājušies virtuvē. Pirmajā šova kārtā katrs no šiem pāriem pie sevis mājās rīko viena vakara restorānu un pasniedz pārējiem šova dalībniekiem un galvenajiem tiesnešiem trīs ēdienus. Nākamajā kārtā komandām tiek doti uzdevumi gatavot dažādos apstākļos dažādiem cilvēkiem, un vājākajiem nākas cīnīties par palikšanu šovā. Un tā līdz pat uzvarai! Šova galvenie tiesneši ir vieni no labākajiem Austrālijas šefpavāriem – Pīts Evans un Manū Fīldels.

programme.title: Manas mājas ar IKEA 10
programme.desc: Interjera pārvērtību raidījumā “Manas mājas ar IKEA” desmit dalībnieki kopā ar IKEA dizainerēm pārveido savas iepriekš pieteiktās telpas, ieviešot praktiskus un iedvesmojošus uzlabojumus tajās. Jubilejas sezonā pārvērtības plānos un ieviesīs IKEA dizaineres, savukārt dalībnieki izlozēs veicamo pārvērtību budžetu. Neizpaliks piedzīvojumi, emocijas, daudz noderīgu padomu un, protams, arī desmit skaistas telpu pārvērtības.

programme.title: Manas mājas ar IKEA 10
programme.desc: Interjera pārvērtību raidījumā “Manas mājas ar IKEA” desmit dalībnieki kopā ar IKEA dizainerēm pārveido savas iepriekš pieteiktās telpas, ieviešot praktiskus un iedvesmojošus uzlabojumus tajās. Jubilejas sezonā pārvērtības plānos un ieviesīs IKEA dizaineres, savukārt dalībnieki izlozēs veicamo pārvērtību budžetu. Neizpaliks piedzīvojumi, emocijas, daudz noderīgu padomu un, protams, arī desmit skaistas telpu pārvērtības.

programme.title: Palikt vai pārvākties. Lielbritānija
programme.desc: Katras ģimenes dzīvē reiz pienāk brīdis, kad esošais mājoklis kļūst par šauru, nepiemērots jauniem ģimenes apstākļiem vai arī vienkārši apnīk. Ģimene nonāk izvēles priekšā – mēģināt uzlabot esošo mājokli vai tomēr meklēt jaunu. Tiek izvēlētas ģimenes, kurās domas dalās – viens ir pieradis pie esošās vietas vai apkaimes un nevēlas pārvākties, otrs uzskata, ka esošais mājoklis nav piemērojams jaunajām vajadzībām, tāpēc jāmeklē cits. Pieņemt lēmumu ģimenei palīdzēs profesionāls interjera dizaineris un nekustamā īpašuma mākleris – viņi abi konkrēta budžeta ietvaros mēģinās pierādīt katrs savu taisnību – dizaineris ķersies klāt esošajam mājoklim, lai to pārveidotu līdz nepazīšanai, bet mākleris meklēs jaunu, ģimenes prasībām piemērotu mājokli. Kurš galu galā uzvarēs – ko izlems ģimene?

programme.title: Tandēmā 7
programme.desc: Majore Lea Selēra ir leģendāra – izmeklētājas kontā ir gandrīz divi simti atrisinātu lietu. Viņa pārvākusies uz Monpeljē, kur viņas pakļautībā strādā arī kapteinis Pols Maršals, Lea bijušais vīrs un divu bērnu tēvs. Par spīti senām nesaskaņām un strīdiem abi viens otru pazīst labāk kā jebkuru citu, un abi ir izcili izmeklētāji, kas lieliski papildina viens otru. Milzu pieredze, vērība pamanīt vissmalkākās detaļas, ass prāts salikt kopā visus puzles gabaliņus, labi attīstīta intuīcija – neaizstājamu īpašību kokteilis, kas abus padara par nepārspējamu tandēmu.

programme.title: Doktors Mārtins 9
programme.desc: Uz sevi vērsts, neiecietīgs un rupjš – tā tiek raksturots vienīgais Anglijas mazpilsētas iedzīvotājiem pieejamais ārsts Doktors Mārtins. Viņa apvainojošie komentāri un formalitāte ir aizvainojoša, un ne velti par dakteri sūkstās vietējie. Drīz vien vietējie iedzīvotāji atklāj, Mārtinam ir hemofobija (bailes no asinīm). Tomēr, efektīvi reaģējot uz dažādām ārkārtas situācijām, Mārtins pamazām gūst apkārtējo cieņu. Doktora Mārtina cieto dabu mīkstinās satiktā pamatskolas skolotāja Luīza Glāsona, pret kuru viņam radīsies romantiskas jūtas, kas vēlāk pāraugs mīlestībā.

programme.title: Berlīnes ūdens policija
programme.desc: Galvenā inspektore Jasmīna Sajeda Vācijā nodzīvojusi jau 30 gadu un lielāko daļu dzīves pašaizliedzīgi aizstāvējusi likumu. Nu viņa ir iecelta par pilotprojekta “Berlīnes ūdens policija” vadītāju un ir sapulcinājusi savu ideālo komandu, uz kuru paļaujas. Ar “Berlīnes iedzimto”, detektīvi Paulu Šprengeri Jasmīna draudzējas kopš bērnības. Šī draudzība ne vienmēr nāk par labu, taču profesionālā ziņā abas lieliski papildina viena otru: Jasmīna redz visu kopskatu, bet Paula pievēršas detaļām. Uz patruļas kuģa “Sudrabkaija” dienē arī policisti Fari Čeliks un Marlēna Vēbere. Tiesu mediķis Jans Konrāds, iespējams, ir visefektīvākais ierocis ūdens policijas komandā. Pieredzējušais kapteinis Volfs Malecke ir komandas lielākais balsts, savukārt kuģa talismans, pinkainais suņuks Štulle allaž ir uzticīgs kompanjons, lai kurp vestu izmeklēšana. Kopā viņi rūpējas par kārtību un drošību Berlīnes ūdensceļos.

programme.title: TV3 Ziņas īsumā
programme.desc: Dienas jaunākie un svarīgākie notikumi īsumā TV3 ziņu žurnālistu veidotās reportāžās.

programme.title: Pasaules bīstamākie ceļi 5
programme.desc: Autoceļi uz šīs planētas sastopami visneticamākajās vietās. Bet kas liek mums, cilvēkiem, izvēlēties maršrutus, kuru mērošanas cena sliktākajā gadījumā ir dzīvība? Britu slavenības dodas ceļojumā pa visneparastākajiem un bīstamākajiem ceļiem uz zemeslodes, šai dēkainajā piedzīvojumā iepazīstot elpu aizraujošas ainavas un tradīcijām bagātas tautas.

programme.title: Bez Tabu
programme.desc: Bez Tabu interesē, kā tautai klājas! Neviens jautājums mums, Bez Tabu, žurnālistiem nešķiet muļķīgs un nav par grūtu! Ar azartu raidījums Bez Tabu ķeras klāt katram jaunam stāstam – palīdzēt, risināt, noskaidrot, atmaskot un iedvesmot, stāstot par mūsu pašu cilvēku talantiem un brīnumspējām!

programme.title: TV3 Ziņas
programme.desc: Svarīgākās ziņas Latvijā, TV3 žurnālistu veidots saturs par notiekošo mūsu valstī un to, kā tas skar katru no mums.

programme.title: Sporta ziņas
programme.desc: Ziņas par svarīgāko un aktuālāko sporta pasaulē.

programme.title: Degpunktā
programme.desc: Operatīvas kriminālziņas, ziņas par avārijām uz Latvijas ceļiem un cita informācija no diennakts karstāko notikumu epicentra.

programme.title: Maģiskās durvis
programme.desc: Divi praktikanti Pols un Sofija uzsāk karjeru noslēpumainā Londonas uzņēmumā “J.W. Wells and Co”. Drīz abi atklāj, ka viņu darba devēji, tostarp harizmātiskais izpilddirektors Hamfrijs Velss un menedžeris Deniss Taners, ievieš revolucionāras pārmaiņas: modernās korporatīvās stratēģijas te tiek apvienotas ar senām maģiskām praksēm. Kad Pols un Sofija atklāj uzņēmuma noslēpumus, viņiem tiek dots uzdevums: atrast spēcīgu maģisku artefaktu – durvis, kas ikvienu acumirklī var aizvest uz jebkuru vietu pasaulē. Tas izrādīsies mīklām, izaicinājumiem un maģiskām intrigām pilns ceļojums, jo izgaismos bīstamu patiesību, kas slēpjas aiz “J.Wells and Co”.

programme.title: Attiecību statuss: atļauts krāpt
programme.desc: Anna un Vils viens otram ir pirmie it visā. Pirmais skūpsts, pirmā mīlestība, pirmās un vienīgās īstās attiecības. Pēc desmit gadu kopdzīves, Annas 30. gadu jubileja ballītē iereibis draugs izaicina pāri eksperimentēt ar attiecībām, ļaujoties dēkām ar citiem.

programme.title: Van der Valks
programme.desc: 1. sērijaIzmeklētājs Van der Valks un viņa komanda iedziļinās mākslas un politikas pasaulē, kad divi šķietami savstarpēji nesaistīti vīrieši tiek atrasti noslepkavoti dažādās Amsterdamas vietās vienā un tajā pašā dienā. Vai nāves gadījumi ir saistīti? Un vai slepkavībām varētu būt kāds sakars ar gaidāmajām vēlēšanām?

programme.title: Bez Tabu. Gada balvas pasniegšanas ceremonija
programme.desc: Jau divpadsmito reizi “Bez Tabu” apbalvos labākos no labākajiem sižetu varoņiem. Kam un par kādiem nopelniem “Bez Tabu” Gada balvas tiks sadalītas šogad?

programme.title: UgunsGrēks 5
programme.desc: Vai ar Leona redzi viss būs kārtībā, un kā noritēs viņa tikšanās ar Elizabeti? Vai Helēna un Donāts viegli pieradīs pie jaunā ģimenes stāvokļa? Vai Solveigai izdosies atkal pielabināties Aivaram? Vai Kitija atteiksies no sava plāna apprecēt Leonu? Vai Vadims turpinās krāpt Silviju un Silvija to piecietīs? Jautājumi, izvēles, intrigas... Viss turpinās!

programme.title: Pēdējās trīs dienas
programme.desc: Slepenpolicists Džeks dara visu iespējamo, lai likvidētu Japānas noziedzības sindikātu. Taču kādu rītu viņš pamostas, neatceroties, kas noticis pēdējo 72 stundu laikā. Detektīvs aptver, ka ir zaudējis sievu, uzticamo partneri un trīs dienas no savas dzīves. Vai viņš spēs atsaukt atmiņā kaut mirkli no notikušā un vai atgūtās atmiņas neizrādīsies bīstamas pašam Džekam?

programme.title: Megabūves toreiz un tagad
programme.desc: Pasaules jaunākie inženiertehniskie sasniegumi, modernāko tehnoloģiju transportlīdzekļi un izcilas konstrukcijas – kā šo mūsdienu megaceltņu tapšana izskatās salīdzinājumā ar to leģendārajiem ekvivalentiem? Vai mūsdienu luksusa kruīza kuģis var pārspēt slaveno Titāniku? Vai Vemblija stadions ir pārāks par Kolizeju? Šīs dokumentālās sērijas ļaus atklāt iespaidīgo konstrukciju tapšanas aizkulises: katras megabūves izbūvi – vai tā būtu vēsturiska vai moderna celtne – aizēnojušas problēmas būvniecības procesā, materiālu nepieejamība vai izaicinājumi, ko radīja ieplānotā atrašanās vieta. Apķērīgi inženieri visos laikos spēja rast šīm problēmām lielisku risinājumu. Bet vai mūsdienu celtnes patiešām ir pārākas par senlaiku būvēm?

programme.title: Krimināli smieklīgi
programme.desc: Noziedznieki mēdz būt neģēlīgi, zemiski, baisi, nekrietni un arī... krimināli smieklīgi. Šī ir tava iespēja savām acīm skatīt dažus no nejēdzīgākajiem, dīvainākajiem un idiotiskākajiem noziedzniekiem, ko šī planēta var piedāvāt. Videonovērošanas kadri un ar telefonu uzņemti aculiecinieku video, kas liks nosarkt likumpārkāpēja vietā. No zagļiem, ko aizraida vecas, sirmas kundzītes, līdz caur griestiem krītošiem laupītājiem – skaties un uzjautrinies!

programme.title: Krimināli smieklīgi
programme.desc: Noziedznieki mēdz būt neģēlīgi, zemiski, baisi, nekrietni un arī... krimināli smieklīgi. Šī ir tava iespēja savām acīm skatīt dažus no nejēdzīgākajiem, dīvainākajiem un idiotiskākajiem noziedzniekiem, ko šī planēta var piedāvāt. Videonovērošanas kadri un ar telefonu uzņemti aculiecinieku video, kas liks nosarkt likumpārkāpēja vietā. No zagļiem, ko aizraida vecas, sirmas kundzītes, līdz caur griestiem krītošiem laupītājiem – skaties un uzjautrinies!

programme.title: Atpūta zaļumos
programme.desc: Automašīnu tirgotājs Čets Riplijs aizved savu ģimeni uz nomaļu naminū idilliska ezera krastā, lai pavadītu atvaļinājumu dabas klēpī. Taču visus Četa atpūtas plānus izjauc viņa sievas māsa Keita ar savu neciešamo vīru Romānu. Jaunbagātnieks Romāns par dabas mātes bagātībām nav sajūsmā, ja vien tās neizmanto uzņēmējdarbībai. Drīz vien šis temats starp viņu un Četu izraisa nesaskaņas, aizsākot veselu strīdu lavīnu, kas veļas pāri ģimenei un draud iznīcināt visus miera un atpūtas priekus.

programme.title: Rēgu patruļa
programme.desc: Kad pienākumu pildīšanas laikā nogalina policistu Niku Vokeru, viņam nekas cits neatliek kā pievienoties Rēgu patruļai, kas aizsargā dzīvos no nemierīgajām dvēselēm, kuras atsakās mierīgi doties uz viņsauli. Pieredzējušais šerifs Rojs Palsifers jau sen strādā leģendārajā Rēgu patruļā, meklējot briesmīgos garus, kuri izliekas par parastiem cilvēkiem. Nikam ierāda viņa palīga lomu. Tagad jaunajiem pāriniekiem jāstrādā kopā, lai atklātu sazvērestību, kas var iznīcināt pasauli.

programme.title: Bandīti
programme.desc: Brunču mednieks Džo (Brūss Viliss) un viņa hipohondriskais draugs Terijs (Bilijs Bobs Torntons) aizbēg no cietuma un dodas uz Kaliforniju, pa ceļam aplaupot bankas. Viņu plāns ir revolucionārs: labi nomaskējušies, Džo un Terijs iepriekšējā vakarā pārsteidz filiāļu vadītājus viņu mājās, saņem ģimenes par ķīlniekiem un no rīta mierīgi iztīra kasi. Viņu plāns rit lieliski, līdz viņi satiek Keitu (Keita Blanšeta). Neapmierināta laulībā, viņa pievienojas bandītu duetam un iemīlas Džo. Taču arī Terijam rodas jūtas pret Keitu, un mīlas trijstūris kļūst par bumbu ar laika degli.

programme.title: A komanda
programme.desc: Filma „A komanda” ir balstīta uz 80. gadu spriedzes seriāla varoņiem un notikumiem. Četri bijušie specvienības karavīri pēc nepatiesas apsūdzības spiesti pamest armiju un kļūt par algotņiem. Neilgi pēc ierašanās Irākā, viņus apsūdz par iesaistīšanos noziedzīgā plānā viltot ASV naudu. Visi četri tiek apcietināti, taču viņiem izdodas no izbēgt no ieslodzījuma.

programme.title: Gāzi grīdā: ziemas prieki.
programme.desc: Džeremijs Klārksons, Ričards Hemonds un Džeimss Mejs piedāvā savu labāko ziemas izaicinājumu izlasi. Kad zemi klāj sniegs un ledus, ar automašīnām taču var darīt tik daudz ko jautru! Piemēram, sacensties ātrumā ar bobsleju, spēlēt hokeju ar miniatūrām Suzuki automašīnām, kā arī noskaidrot, vai, braucot ar Ferari no Lielbritānijas līdz slēpošanas kūrortiem var nonākt ātrāk kā ar lidmašīnu.

programme.title: Gāzi grīdā: ziemas prieki.

programme.title: Ekspedīcija ar Stīvu Bekšelu 2
programme.desc: Drosmīgos piedzīvojumos sev līdzi aicina britu dabaszinātnieks, pētnieks, rakstnieks, pasniedzējs un televīzijas zvaigzne – Stīvs Bekšals. Dodies ekstrēmos ceļojumos un ielūkojies unikālos nostūros, kur kāju spēris vien retais.

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks
programme.desc: Bārenis Pīters Pārkers ir vienkāršs, kautrīgs puisis, kuram ir divas aizraušanās - fotografēšana un skaistā klasesbiedrene Mērija Džeina Vatsone. Kādu dienu, apmeklējot zinātniski pētniecisko centru, Pīteru sakož no stikla būrīša izbēgušais zirneklis. Drīz vien, atklājot sevī visas ģenētiski modificētā zirnekļa spējas, viņš kļūst par noziedznieku apkarotāju un taisnības aizstāvi.

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks 2
programme.desc: Pīters Pārkers atklāja savas spējas pirms diviem gadiem. Tomēr viņš joprojām nesaprot, vai tās ir dāvana vai lāsts. Starp divām identitātēm ir ļoti grūti balansēt – vienlaikus veikt varoņdarbus, esot Zirnekļcilvēka ādā, un būt perfektam koledžas studentam. Strupceļā draud nonākt arī Pītera draudzība ar Hariju Osbornu. Būdams pārliecināts, ka tēva nāvē vainojams tieši supervaronis Zirnekļcilvēks, Harijs ir nolēmis viņu atrast un atriebties. Tik sarežģītos apstākļos nav iespējams izrādīt pietiekami daudz uzmanības pat meitenei, kuru Pīters mīl. Pamazām viņš atklāj, ka neparastās spējas ir vājinājušās, tādēļ reizēm kādā varoņdarbā viss neizdodas, kā iecerēts. Vai tiešām viņš vairs nav Zirnekļcilvēks? Dzīve sarežģās vēl vairāk, kad Pīters sastop jaunu, grūti uzveicamu ienaidnieku – doktoru Otto Astoņkāji. Šī ļaundara rīcībā ir ne tikai astoņas ķēžu kājas, kas padara viņu neuzveicamu, bet arī zinātnisks atklājums, kas spēj iznīcināt jebko. Pīteram jāsakopo visi spēki, lai apturētu nežēlīgo un apsēsto Astoņkāji.

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks 3
programme.desc: Beidzot Pīteram Pārkeram ir viņa sapņu meitene Mērija Džeina Votsone un visu Ņujorku ir pārņēmusi Zirnekļcilvēka mānija! Taču kad kāda dīvaina vara liek Zirnekļcilvēka tērpam pārvērsties un kļūt melnam, arī viņa prātu pārņem tumšas domas un dēmoni. Tagad Zirnekļcilvēkam ir jācīnās gan pašam ar sevi, gan ar veselu virkni jaunu ļaunu pretinieku.

programme.title: “Greenpeace” iekšienē
programme.desc: Dokumentālo filmu sērijā iemūžināti kadri, vairāku gadu garumā sekojot septiņiem aktīvistiem septiņpadsmit valstīs. Filma sniedz unikālu ieskatu kampaņu plānošanā, kuras tika veiktas vislielākajā slepenībā. Vissvarīgākā naftas pārkraušanas punkta Eiropā – Roterdamas ostas – blokāde, nelikumīgas mežu izciršanas izgaismošana Brazīlijas Amazones lietus mežos, 2022. gada jūlijā notikusī operācija Černobiļas atomelektrostacijā, kuras laikā aktīvisti dokumentēja Krievijas militāro darbību radīto ietekmi uz cilvēkiem un vidi – atklāj, kā tika izplānoti un īstenoti šie un citi aktīvistu pasākumi.

programme.title: Ledaino ceļu glābēji 6
programme.desc: Kad iestājas ziema, Norvēģijas kalni kļūst par īstu nāves slazdu. Sniega vētras pārvērš ceļus bīstamā ellē, biezās kupenas bloķē svarīgus tirdzniecības ceļus un apledojušais ceļu segums izraisa smagus negadījumus – nereti ar letālām sekām. Kataklizmu palīdz novērst glābēji, kuri riskē ar savu dzīvību, lai glābtu citus. Viņu misijas bieži izvēršas sacīkstēs uz dzīvību un nāvi.

programme.title: Pirmatnējā izdzīvošana: Varenā Mekonga
programme.desc: Nomaļas, pirmatnējas ciltis, kas dziļi nekurienē mīt jau tūkstošiem gadu – kādus izdzīvošanas noslēpumus tās glabā? Piedzīvojumu meklētājs un savvaļas gids Heizens Odels šai sezonā mēros 800 kilometru pa akmeņainajiem apvidiem un slidenajiem purviem, kas ieskauj varenās Mekongas upes baseinu, lai apgūtu seno cilšu gudrības. Dzīve pieticīgos, skarbos apstākļos šiem cilvēkiem iemācījusi efektīvā izdzīvošanas rīkā pārvērst teju visu, kas nekust un arī kust. Garajā ceļā Heizenam Odelam nāksies saskarties ar briesmām, kas slēpjas džungļos un appludinātajos līdzenumos, paļaujoties tikai uz Mekongas pamatiedzīvotāju tradicionālajām izdzīvošanas prasmēm.

programme.title: Radījums (1982)
programme.desc: Paleontoloģe Keita dodas ekspedīcijā uz grūti pieejamu reģionu Antarktīdā, kur zinātnieki atklājuši senu kosmosa kuģi. Tajā atrodas sasalis citplanētieša organisms, kas eksperimenta rezultātā atdzīvojas. Atbrīvots no sava ledus cietuma, radījums sāk vajāt un nogalināt zinātniekus vienu pēc otra. Visu sarežģī tas, ka radījums ir apveltīts ar spēju pieņemt jebkura cilvēka veidolu. Keitai nākas apvienot spēkus ar pilotu Karteru, lai uzvarētu šajā nevienlīdzīgajā cīņā.

programme.title: Ultravioleta
programme.desc: 21. gadsimta beigās cilvēku rasi piemeklējusi bīstama slimība, kas ģenētiski modificē cilvēku spējas. Jaunās paaudzes pārstāvjus raksturo izcils ātrums, fiziskais spēks un inteliģence, kas padara tos ļoti līdzīgus vampīriem. Lai gan inficētie atgādina pārcilvēkus, viņi mirst divpadsmit gadu laikā. Lai kontrolētu bīstamā vīrusa izplatību, varas iestādes nolemj sākt pārcilvēku iznīcināšanu. Pilsoņu kara priekšā pirms desmit gadiem inficētā Violeta ir vienīgā, kas spēj sagraut baisos valdības plānus. Viņa ir apņēmusies atrast antigēnu...

programme.title: Karstais pārītis: apbruņotas un apburošas
programme.desc: FIB aģente Sāra Ešbērna ir ārkārtīgi ambicioza, iedomīga un godkārīga būtne, kura nesatiek ar saviem kolēģiem. Viņu nosūta uz Bostonu noskaidrot izveicīgā narkotirgoņa Lārkina kunga identitāti. Bostonā Ešbērnai jāstrādā kopā ar noteikumu pārkāpēju Malinsu, taču sadarboties būs grūti, jo Ešbērna visu dara pēc priekšrakstiem, savukārt Malinsa rīkojas pēc sava prāta. Vai atšķirīgās kolēģes spēs notvert nelieti un procesa laikā kļūt par draudzenēm?

programme.title: Ekspedīcija ar Stīvu Bekšelu 2
programme.desc: Drosmīgos piedzīvojumos sev līdzi aicina britu dabaszinātnieks, pētnieks, rakstnieks, pasniedzējs un televīzijas zvaigzne – Stīvs Bekšals. Dodies ekstrēmos ceļojumos un ielūkojies unikālos nostūros, kur kāju spēris vien retais.

programme.title: The Fascists and the Freemasons
programme.desc: Nazism and fascism shared a hatred for the Freemasons, the most powerful society of their times; we investigate the reasons for fascisms obsession with Freemasonry and uncover its consequences.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare
programme.sub-title: Air supremacy has been key to winning a war since the dawn of aerial warfare; from the Sopwith Camel biplane to the F22 Raptor, we identify and rank the most influential aircrafts in history.
programme.desc: This is the story of warfare in the modern age; from the Spitfire to the stealth bombers of the second Iraq conflict, each episode features ten stories from the conflicts of the 20th and 21st century.

programme.title: The Underground Army
programme.sub-title: The Polish underground state wages a propaganda war - meanwhile, military intelligence steals the greatest German secrets of ballistic missiles, and there is a daring escape from Pawiak prison.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Polish Underground State, the largest group of anti-Hitler guerrillas in occupied Europe; we learn how they showed incredible resilience and changed the course of WWII.

programme.title: Unearthed: Ancient Murder Mysteries
programme.sub-title: Homicide detective Rod Demery and forensic scientist Turi King examine a murder victim dated to the time of the Picts and unearthed in a remote sea cave in Scotland.
programme.desc: Homicide detective Rod Demery and scientist Professor Turi King use modern techniques to investigate historys most intriguing murders; they visit Italy, Scotland, Denmark and the US.

programme.title: Cracking The Code
programme.sub-title: This episode reveals the story of the woman who cracked the codes that brought down the Mob, saved countless lives in WWII, and even prevented a Nazi invasion of the US.
programme.desc: We uncover some of the worlds most famous encryptions and reveal how they were decoded, the brilliant minds who cracked them, and the mysteries they were hiding.

programme.title: Cursed Treasures
programme.sub-title: A discovery by peat-cutters in Cheshire in England reveals whispers of a curse, and a car in Austria is believed to bring doom and death to those who owned or rode in it.
programme.desc: Leading experts in their field try to unravel the mystery behind fascinating and doomed objects including Tutankhamuns tomb, the Terracotta Army, the Hope Diamond and the Amber Room.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.sub-title: Does a strange carved wooden tablet hold the secrets of a lost civilisation, could a machine really measure beauty, and could a disk that looks 3D-printed really have come from ancient Egypt?
programme.desc: Hidden away in museums, laboratories, and storage rooms around the world are the most remarkable objects on Earth; using new research and technology, we get under their skin like never before.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: One of the richest men on Earth, Aristotle Onassis left a string of broken hearts in his wake, but no romance would catapult him into the limelight like his marriage to Jacqueline Kennedy.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: The Grimaldi family has held their posts as sovereigns of Monaco with the utmost grace, but one thing they have missed time and again is good luck in the love department.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: The tragic histories of the political dynasties of the Bhutto family in Pakistan and the Nehru-Gandhi family in India are often compared to that of Americas Kennedy family.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Bronze-Age Apocalypse
programme.sub-title: Professor Salima Ikram shows us an extraordinary series of reliefs and inscriptions about Ramses battles with the Sea People at Ramses IIIs mortuary temple at Medinet Habu in Egypt.
programme.desc: Life in the eastern Mediterranean was flourishing in the Late Bronze Age (around 1250 B.C. / B.C.E); the Hittites had established a mighty empire that controlled most of Anatolia and northern Syria.

programme.title: Bronze-Age Apocalypse
programme.sub-title: Around 1200 B.C. / B.C.E.: Bronze Age people are on the move across the Eastern Mediterranean and sacking and burning the great centres of civilisation as they go.
programme.desc: Life in the eastern Mediterranean was flourishing in the Late Bronze Age (around 1250 B.C. / B.C.E); the Hittites had established a mighty empire that controlled most of Anatolia and northern Syria.

programme.title: D-Day: The Soldiers Story
programme.sub-title: Giles Milton visits key D-Day sites along the Normandy coastline - including Omaha Beach and Pegasus Bridge - and we hear the stories of the men and women on both the attacking and defensive lines.
programme.desc: A two-part documentary that tells the story of D-Day - June the 6th, 1944 like its never been told before as presenter Giles Milton reveals an astonishing tale of fear, courage and heroism.

programme.title: The Masters of the Reich
programme.sub-title: Hitler used confrontations between economic crises and street violence to provoke the need for more authoritarian power; the ordinary man with political genius became the Chancellor of Peace.
programme.desc: This series sheds a new light on the Second World War by revealing what the masters of the Reich and their acolytes were really saying to each other while being filmed thinking no-one could hear them.

programme.title: The Masters of the Reich
programme.sub-title: Decoding tools reveal exchanges between the Fuhrer and his allies; Hitler morphs from political leader to military strategist; the masters of the Reich unleash a world war in seven years.
programme.desc: This series sheds a new light on the Second World War by revealing what the masters of the Reich and their acolytes were really saying to each other while being filmed thinking no-one could hear them.

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: World War II fostered the emergence of both iconic and unusual tanks that were each engineered with distinct aims; we explore diverse tank innovations and the overall trajectory of armoured warfare.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: The Maisy Battery was made up of three-and-a-half miles of recently-excavated trenches, bunkers, barracks, and gun encasements near Pointe du Hoc that tell a new story of D-Day.
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.title: D-Day: The 80th Anniversary
programme.desc: This documentary shows a different side of D-Day: not just the famous shots of the beaches at Normandy, but the troops, sailors and civilians on the South Coast of England preparing for battle too.

programme.title: Ramses: The Great King of Egypt
programme.sub-title: 1323 B.C. / B.C.E.: Egypt is still in chaos left by Akhenatens attempted religious revolution when his son, the young king Tutankhamun, dies; the 18th dynasty comes to an end in a state of disorder.
programme.desc: Featuring unique access to the latest archaeological discoveries, this series exposes the man behind a myth and reveals how the mighty Ramses has remained a caricature of his own propaganda.

programme.title: Ramses: The Great King of Egypt
programme.sub-title: Ramses Is eight-year-old son Seti becomes king and all eyes are on him; the young prince representes the future of the new royal family which has yet to assert its influence over the kingdom.
programme.desc: Featuring unique access to the latest archaeological discoveries, this series exposes the man behind a myth and reveals how the mighty Ramses has remained a caricature of his own propaganda.

programme.title: Ramses: The Great King of Egypt
programme.sub-title: Seti I is still in his prime when he dies in 1279 B.C. / B.C.E.; despite his short reign, it proves brilliant and gives Prince Ramses ample time to perfect his education for his future role as king.
programme.desc: Featuring unique access to the latest archaeological discoveries, this series exposes the man behind a myth and reveals how the mighty Ramses has remained a caricature of his own propaganda.

programme.title: WWII: Frontlines
programme.sub-title: January 1944: two divisions land at the Italian port of Anzio in one of the easiest Allied assaults of the war, but they fail to exploit their advantage, giving the German defenders time to reinforce.
programme.desc: From North Africa to Northern Europe and the Mediterranean to the Pacific, we reflect on the enormous diversity of conditions which frontline soldiers had to come to grips with during WWII.

programme.title: The Underground Army
programme.sub-title: The Polish underground state wages a propaganda war - meanwhile, military intelligence steals the greatest German secrets of ballistic missiles, and there is a daring escape from Pawiak prison.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Polish Underground State, the largest group of anti-Hitler guerrillas in occupied Europe; we learn how they showed incredible resilience and changed the course of WWII.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Science
programme.sub-title: What would it take to bomb the Allies into the ground? This was the question on the minds of top Nazi brass as they mobilised Germanys top scientists to create frightening new bombs.
programme.desc: When the Nazi empire collapsed at the end of WWII, the darkest secrets of the Third Reich came to light; this series exposes everything from biological experiments to supersize feats of engineering.

programme.title: Unearthed: Ancient Murder Mysteries
programme.sub-title: Homicide detective Rod Demery and forensic scientist Turi King examine a murder victim dated to the time of the Picts and unearthed in a remote sea cave in Scotland.
programme.desc: Homicide detective Rod Demery and scientist Professor Turi King use modern techniques to investigate historys most intriguing murders; they visit Italy, Scotland, Denmark and the US.

programme.title: Cracking The Code
programme.sub-title: This episode reveals the story of the woman who cracked the codes that brought down the Mob, saved countless lives in WWII, and even prevented a Nazi invasion of the US.
programme.desc: We uncover some of the worlds most famous encryptions and reveal how they were decoded, the brilliant minds who cracked them, and the mysteries they were hiding.

programme.title: The Fascists and the Freemasons
programme.desc: Nazism and fascism shared a hatred for the Freemasons, the most powerful society of their times; we investigate the reasons for fascisms obsession with Freemasonry and uncover its consequences.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare
programme.sub-title: 20th-century battles have changed the course of history; the Battle of the Somme saw over 60,000 casualties on the first day alone and D-Day marked the beginning of Hitlers ultimate defeat.
programme.desc: This is the story of warfare in the modern age; from the Spitfire to the stealth bombers of the second Iraq conflict, each episode features ten stories from the conflicts of the 20th and 21st century.

programme.title: The Underground Army
programme.sub-title: Polands underground courts work to ensure the safety of the underground networks; diversion operations against the occupier are instigated, and Polish elite units from England enter the action.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Polish Underground State, the largest group of anti-Hitler guerrillas in occupied Europe; we learn how they showed incredible resilience and changed the course of WWII.

programme.title: Conquistadors: The Rise and Fall
programme.sub-title: Spanish colonies have grown throughout the Americas after decades of conquests, but the Spanish monarchy struggles to control the guardians of New Spain from afar.
programme.desc: Popular culture has painted the Conquistadors as brave Christian pioneers, but a shifting narrative has revealed a darker story to their rise and fall.

programme.title: Queens That Changed The World
programme.sub-title: It was Elizabeths tolerance and wisdom that allowed peace, prosperity, and English culture to flourish; her response to numerous threats saw her become one of the most powerful leaders in history.
programme.desc: For so long believed to be side characters in histories dominated by men, some queens wielded extraordinary power; we discover how six women ruled in ways that far surpassed their male counterparts.

programme.title: Cursed Treasures
programme.sub-title: Items stolen by tourists from the doomed Roman city of Pompeii have created misery and misfortune; meanwhile, a trove of precious artworks considered destroyed or lost forever is discovered in Germany.
programme.desc: Leading experts in their field try to unravel the mystery behind fascinating and doomed objects including Tutankhamuns tomb, the Terracotta Army, the Hope Diamond and the Amber Room.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.sub-title: Why does a 9,000-year-old clay head contain a real skull, can a strange machine built in the 50s really control the weather, and did an archaeologist really stumble on the oldest map of the world?
programme.desc: Hidden away in museums, laboratories, and storage rooms around the world are the most remarkable objects on Earth; using new research and technology, we get under their skin like never before.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: The House of Romanov had imposed 300 years of strict Imperial rule, but royal authority was in question for the first time. The future of the Romanov dynasty was in danger.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: J. Paul Getty was renowned for his wealth and frugality as well as his lack of empathy and compassion for his family. He would marry four times and sire five sons, but he died old and alone.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Egypts Lost Pyramid
programme.desc: An astonishing discovery has been made in the barren desert of northern Egypt: a pyramid with a sealed burial chamber. The contents have been disturbed, but there are no signs of entry...

programme.title: The Black Pharaohs
programme.desc: About 4000 years ago, strong kings ruled for over 1500 years in the land of Kush (now northern Sudan and southern Egypt) - who were these African kings and what happened to them?

programme.title: D-Day: The Soldiers Story
programme.sub-title: Giles Milton guides us round Normandy - the place where the D-Day invasion proved successful - from the gliders who went behind enemy lines to paratroopers who ambushed vital German generals.
programme.desc: A two-part documentary that tells the story of D-Day - June the 6th, 1944 like its never been told before as presenter Giles Milton reveals an astonishing tale of fear, courage and heroism.

programme.title: The Masters of the Reich
programme.sub-title: We look at the conversations at the heart of German power; the deciphering of archive images allows us to understand the motivations of the Nazi regime in their conquest of Europe.
programme.desc: This series sheds a new light on the Second World War by revealing what the masters of the Reich and their acolytes were really saying to each other while being filmed thinking no-one could hear them.

programme.title: The Masters of the Reich
programme.sub-title: We look at the Nazi hegemony from 1941 to its decline in 1945; deciphered archives show us the greatest offensive of the 20th century in the East as well as the apocalypse of a ruined Germany.
programme.desc: This series sheds a new light on the Second World War by revealing what the masters of the Reich and their acolytes were really saying to each other while being filmed thinking no-one could hear them.

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: World War II ignited a fierce battle for aerial dominance and drove nations to pioneer secret aircraft technologies; this episode explores the development of early jet fighters.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: The Spanish island of Villa Winter was suspected of being a port for German U-boats and part of a larger plan to invade the United States.
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.desc: We uncover some of the worlds most famous encryptions and reveal how they were decoded, the brilliant minds who cracked them, and the mysteries they were hiding.

programme.title: Ramses: The Great King of Egypt

programme.desc: Featuring unique access to the latest archaeological discoveries, this series exposes the man behind a myth and reveals how the mighty Ramses has remained a caricature of his own propaganda.

programme.title: Ramses: The Great King of Egypt
programme.sub-title: Ramses reaches the 30th year of his reign as a pharaoh of unparalleled achievements, but he has little time to savour his lengthy tenure on the throne amid the grandeur.
programme.desc: Featuring unique access to the latest archaeological discoveries, this series exposes the man behind a myth and reveals how the mighty Ramses has remained a caricature of his own propaganda.

programme.title: Ramses: The Great King of Egypt
programme.sub-title: Ramses fortified borders and established peace with other kingdoms during his long reign; his 13th son Merenptah must strive to uphold his fathers legacy, but will his efforts prove sufficient?
programme.desc: Featuring unique access to the latest archaeological discoveries, this series exposes the man behind a myth and reveals how the mighty Ramses has remained a caricature of his own propaganda.

programme.title: WWII: Frontlines
programme.sub-title: June 1944: a stretch of beach overlooked by fortified cliffs created a devastating baptism of fire. Failed plans, missed opportunities, and courage make this frontline a major turning point in WWII.
programme.desc: From North Africa to Northern Europe and the Mediterranean to the Pacific, we reflect on the enormous diversity of conditions which frontline soldiers had to come to grips with during WWII.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Science

programme.desc: When the Nazi empire collapsed at the end of WWII, the darkest secrets of the Third Reich came to light; this series exposes everything from biological experiments to supersize feats of engineering.

programme.title: Women Under Hitlers Flag
programme.sub-title: This first episode, which begins with Hitlers arrival in power in 1933, goes back to the roots of the indoctrination of young German girls within the female branch of the Hitler Youth (BDM).
programme.desc: Many German women were active participants in the Nazi regime, some proving to be as ruthless as their better-known male counterparts; why did post-war justice turn a blind eye to their crimes?

programme.title: Women Under Hitlers Flag
programme.sub-title: Women were far from mere witnesses or accomplices by 1942 - and played a role as important as it was deadly. After the war, the women of the Reich simply slipped through the judicial net.
programme.desc: Many German women were active participants in the Nazi regime, some proving to be as ruthless as their better-known male counterparts; why did post-war justice turn a blind eye to their crimes?

programme.title: Ancient Superstructures
programme.sub-title: The Church of the Holy Sepulchre is the most sacred Christian site in the world; defied by time, wars and earthquakes, it was rebuilt many times and now excavations reveal its secrets as never before.
programme.desc: We delve into the engineering mysteries behind the worlds most famous ancient structures by observing them from perspectives ranging from satellite imagery right down to macro and microscopic levels.

programme.title: The Secrets of Hieroglyphics
programme.desc: We meet a team of Egyptologists in Luxor; they are intrigued by a richly adorned tomb where they try to uncover the secrets of its priests, scribes, painters, engravers and builders.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: The team releases pythons, teaches a pangolin how to hunt, and rounds up a troop of vervet monkeys; they also search for a missing bird of prey and help a bush pig hurt by poachers dogs.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.sub-title: Dr James must save a very special bird, Dr Hamish treats very cute Australian mammal Shug, and Dr Lucinda investigates why adopted pet cockatiel Snowy is laying an excessive number of eggs.
programme.desc: Dr James Haberfield and his team from Unusual Pet Vets treat the most bizarre and beloved animals in Australia; with three clinics across the country, they see hundreds of species every week.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.sub-title: Discover how some of the worlds most extraordinary animals are also the smallest. This action-packed episode will take you deep into rainforests, under the oceans and across vast deserts.
programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of natures wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter heads to a neighbours farm hoping that he can save the life of a seriously ill sheep, and cocker spaniel Paddy has an unusual hernia that Julian will need to find a way to fix.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter removes an oven glove from terrier Wesleys stomach and an optometrist spots a problem with his daughters pet rabbit Patch; Julian makes the difficult decision to remove an eye.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt arrives in eastern Zambia to film three packs of wild dogs - the Manzis, Kakulis and Stork Colony - in three very different territories.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.sub-title: Dr James must save a very special bird, Dr Hamish treats very cute Australian mammal Shug, and Dr Lucinda investigates why adopted pet cockatiel Snowy is laying an excessive number of eggs.
programme.desc: Dr James Haberfield and his team from Unusual Pet Vets treat the most bizarre and beloved animals in Australia; with three clinics across the country, they see hundreds of species every week.

programme.sub-title: Discover how some of the worlds most extraordinary animals are also the smallest. This action-packed episode will take you deep into rainforests, under the oceans and across vast deserts.
programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of natures wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: An emotional emergency for Peter at a friends farm; Steves wife is seriously ill, and now her favourite sheeps life is in the balance. Julian tries to remove an abscess on Karine the alpacas chin.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Join Julz on a ZCP lion-collaring mission, go fishing with scout Simon, study mealtime pack hierarchy and witness a heartbreaking vigil for a badly-injured Kakumbi pup.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian rushes over to see worried cow farmer Joe, Peter heads to Richards farm - where a sheeps life is in danger - and at the Huddersfield hospital, Brandy the German Shepherd is lame and in pain.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peters under extra pressure with Charlie the horse - he belongs to his niece Jess; when Julian sees Jackie Barlow, its usually about one of her alpacas, but today the patient is her little dog Isla.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian is called to an emergency on Tom Stockils farm and Peter removes an ominous looking lump for boxer dog Boot; this brings back bittersweet memories for Peter of his own beloved boxer Alf.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian meets poorly boy Georgie, a little Lhasa apso with a huge and horrible-looking mouth tumour; Peter examines a cow that has prolapsed her uterus and has to work quickly to try to save her.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Natures Fast Attacks
programme.sub-title: This first episode features footage showing the lightning-fast moves that predators deploy to capture their prey and the rapid escape tactics that will see who wins these high-velocity battles.
programme.desc: In this two-part documentary series, we see footage that captures the lightning-fast moves used to ambush prey and make equally rapid escapes in the terrifying moments between life and death.

programme.title: Natures Fast Attacks
programme.sub-title: In the battle between predator and prey, we explore how deception and speed can often be the difference between life and death; even some of the fastest hunters use stealth to trick their prey.
programme.desc: In this two-part documentary series, we see footage that captures the lightning-fast moves used to ambush prey and make equally rapid escapes in the terrifying moments between life and death.

programme.title: Wild Fighters
programme.sub-title: We often witness combats of all kinds in the animal kingdom - from hand-to-hand fighting to fierce fashion shows and extravagant tournaments - but what is behind all these wild competitions?
programme.desc: Animals fight to ensure their survival, but what are the reasons that make them risk their lives every day, and what are the consequences of winning or losing these battles?

programme.title: Wild Fighters
programme.sub-title: Family is everything; many species live in families, clans, or groups. The survival of each individual depends on the family, and the family depends on the union of all its components.
programme.desc: Animals fight to ensure their survival, but what are the reasons that make them risk their lives every day, and what are the consequences of winning or losing these battles?

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.sub-title: A honeymoon bride is dragged to her death in the Colombian Amazon; when a retired nurse gives crucial new evidence, Jeremy has to prove a far-fetched theory about the brides last moments.
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade is on the hunt for freshwater fish with a taste for human flesh. Using forensic methods, Jeremy illustrates to the viewer how these river monsters are constructed to kill.

programme.title: Extreme Snakes
programme.sub-title: This is the story of how Australias snakes evolved, over millions of years, to thrive and become dominant predators in every ecosystem on one of the harshest and most extreme continents on Earth.
programme.desc: This two-part series takes you on an epic journey through the most harsh - yet exquisite - landscapes and habitats to uncover the remarkable world of Australia and Africas most extreme snakes.

programme.title: Wild Talk
programme.sub-title: We learn about the variety of sounds animals use when they need to communicate; with the help of scientists, we eavesdrop into the secret conversations going on all around us in the animal kingdom.
programme.desc: Recent years have seen an explosion of research into zoosemiotics (the science of animal communications); experts are listening to animals on their own terms to decode their secret languages.

programme.title: Natures Fast Attacks
programme.sub-title: This first episode features footage showing the lightning-fast moves that predators deploy to capture their prey and the rapid escape tactics that will see who wins these high-velocity battles.
programme.desc: In this two-part documentary series, we see footage that captures the lightning-fast moves used to ambush prey and make equally rapid escapes in the terrifying moments between life and death.

programme.title: Natures Fast Attacks
programme.sub-title: In the battle between predator and prey, we explore how deception and speed can often be the difference between life and death; even some of the fastest hunters use stealth to trick their prey.
programme.desc: In this two-part documentary series, we see footage that captures the lightning-fast moves used to ambush prey and make equally rapid escapes in the terrifying moments between life and death.

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.sub-title: A honeymoon bride is dragged to her death in the Colombian Amazon; when a retired nurse gives crucial new evidence, Jeremy has to prove a far-fetched theory about the brides last moments.
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade is on the hunt for freshwater fish with a taste for human flesh. Using forensic methods, Jeremy illustrates to the viewer how these river monsters are constructed to kill.

programme.title: Pantanal - Brazils Natural Miracle
programme.desc: Some animals are under serious threat elsewhere, but they thrive in Brazils wetlands; this documentary reveals their secret and also reminds us why this natural paradise is under threat once more.

programme.title: Extreme Snakes
programme.sub-title: This is the story of how Australias snakes evolved, over millions of years, to thrive and become dominant predators in every ecosystem on one of the harshest and most extreme continents on Earth.
programme.desc: This two-part series takes you on an epic journey through the most harsh - yet exquisite - landscapes and habitats to uncover the remarkable world of Australia and Africas most extreme snakes.

programme.title: Lost Beasts: Unearthed
programme.sub-title: Titanosaurs are the largest animals ever to walk the Earth; palaeontologists explore their gigantic fossils to discover why they grew so big.
programme.desc: From deadly T. rexes to giant woolly mammoths, new evidence reveals how giant beasts evolved to conquer the planet, how they grew so big, and what triggered their extinction.

programme.title: Egypts Secret Valley of the Whales
programme.desc: Join palaeontologists and scientists on a field trip that reveals the remarkable story of whale evolution and investigate how whales lost their legs and went back into the sea.

programme.title: Time of the Giants
programme.desc: The number of discoveries of new dinosaur species has multiplied over the last 20 years; we explore new discoveries and learn how these giants lived and evolved throughout that time.

programme.title: Ice Age: A Frozen World
programme.sub-title: Steve Backshall and Michaela Strachan witness the rise of mega beasts like the woolly mammoth and sabretooth cat; we reveal how these mighty creatures survived such savage environmental extremes.
programme.desc: Naturalist and explorer Steve Backshall - and wildlife presenter Michaela Strachan - take us on a gripping journey into the heart of the Ice Age.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: Dr Amanda removes a sable antelopes collar, and the team helps a baby vervet monkey find a new mum; two orphaned serval cats are also freed, and we follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.sub-title: Dr Jamess dad brings in Lucy, a wounded mangrove monitor lizard, Dr Kiara treats a wild echidna, and Dr Hamish must uncover the cause of Bernoulli the Alexandrine parrots behaviour changes.
programme.desc: Dr James Haberfield and his team from Unusual Pet Vets treat the most bizarre and beloved animals in Australia; with three clinics across the country, they see hundreds of species every week.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.sub-title: For natures giants, being the biggest brings huge advantages and challenges. From massive land mammals to ocean behemoths, how natures giants overcome lifes big problems is awe inspiring.
programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of natures wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: A special episode focusing on births and babies; Julian heads to a local farm where a cow is struggling in labour, and baby goat Daisy has serious eye problems that are affecting her sight.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian rushes to a dramatic emergency at Jackie Barlows alpaca farm; with things returning to normal post-Covid, Peter returns to the Greens farm, where theres now lots of veterinary work to do.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Its 100 degrees and rising; as waterholes dry up, Julz is alarmed to find lions in the Kakuli packs favourite drinking spot but also gets to touch a wild dog for the first time ever.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Head back to the den with the Kakumbi - who are mourning the loss of two pups - and chance upon a hyena lair and a lion pride trying to take down a buffalo.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Fighters
programme.sub-title: Survival is based on eating; if there is no food, you cannot compete to mate, you cannot defend your family from any threat, and you will be unable to achieve good standing in your clan.
programme.desc: Animals fight to ensure their survival, but what are the reasons that make them risk their lives every day, and what are the consequences of winning or losing these battles?

programme.title: Patagonia: Earths Secret Paradise
programme.sub-title: Discover the secret lives of pumas and hummingbirds, soar with condors over glacial peaks, and join extreme kayakers and Patagonias cowboys - the gauchos - as they round up wild horses.
programme.desc: This three-part series discovers the surprising stories of the unusual wildlife and the people that survive in epic Patagonian landscapes of volcanoes, glaciers, desert and treacherous oceans.

programme.title: Natures Ultimate Survivors
programme.sub-title: From surprisingly nurturing reptiles to birds and turtles that employ clever strategies to deceive predators and protect their young, parenthood takes many forms in the wild.
programme.desc: We explore a diverse range of topics that showcase the incredible survival skills animals have developed over time and feature our top 20 animal species for each of these categories.

programme.title: Natures Mass Attacks
programme.sub-title: In the battle to eat or be eaten, its not always the mighty that win; featuring animals from the gigantic to the miniature, this is a fascinating look at the tactics used by predator and prey.
programme.desc: We follow the worlds best pack hunters; from the iconic grey wolf to the surprising collaboration between humans and dolphins, these are predators at their most inventive and cunning.

programme.title: Natures Mass Attacks
programme.sub-title: We focus on the iconic migratory animals of Africa, North America and Oceania as they travel long distances through some of the worlds most stunning landscapes and battle extreme odds of survival.
programme.desc: We follow the worlds best pack hunters; from the iconic grey wolf to the surprising collaboration between humans and dolphins, these are predators at their most inventive and cunning.

programme.title: Deadly Hunters
programme.sub-title: Planet Earth is home to fearsome creatures equipped to maintain their position as apex predators - they are armed to the teeth and possess a predatory prowess few can escape.
programme.desc: We take a look at some of the animals that have led the way in refining their skills as masterful huntsmen; using their size, strength and unique weapons, animals use it all in order to survive.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: Dr Amandas team lose a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, and we check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centres baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.sub-title: Dr James performs surgery on a tiny zebra finch; Dr Lucinda attends to Froggie, the green tree frog who is actually blue; Dr Shane treats a Macquarie turtle whose abscess has burst through its shell.
programme.desc: Dr James Haberfield and his team from Unusual Pet Vets treat the most bizarre and beloved animals in Australia; with three clinics across the country, they see hundreds of species every week.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.sub-title: Living your life at night can present extreme challenges and opportunities. Animals like owls, hyenas with super senses and insects that glow have evolved to succeed in this world without light.
programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of natures wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.
